statements: SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand WHERE season = 'Summer';
SELECT product_id, demand FROM seasonal_demand WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT season, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM seasonal_demand GROUP BY season;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT season, AVG(demand) AS avg_demand FROM seasonal_demand WHERE demand < 50 GROUP BY season ORDER BY avg_demand DESC;
SELECT season, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM seasonal_demand GROUP BY season ORDER BY total_demand DESC
SELECT product_id, season, demand FROM seasonal_demand WHERE season = 'Summer' AND demand > 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand WHERE demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY season, product_id
SELECT DISTINCT season FROM seasonal_demand ORDER BY season DESC
SELECT product_id, AVG(demand) AS average_demand FROM seasonal_demand GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY average_demand
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_patterns ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, demand_rate FROM seasonal_demand_patterns WHERE demand_rate > 50;
SELECT product_name, demand_rate, seasonality_factor FROM seasonal_demand_patterns WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT current_quantity, reorder_threshold FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY current_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_patterns WHERE seasonality_factor BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_patterns WHERE demand_rate > 100 ORDER BY seasonality_factor DESC
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < reorder_threshold
SELECT id, product_name, seasonality_factor FROM seasonal_demand_patterns WHERE seasonality_factor BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_patterns WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < 50
SELECT product_id, season, demand FROM seasonal_demand WHERE season = 'Winter';
SELECT season, product_id, demand FROM seasonal_demand WHERE demand > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_level < optimal_level ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT month, demand FROM historic_demand WHERE product_id = 5 AND month = 'June';
SELECT season, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM seasonal_demand GROUP BY season;
SELECT product_id, season, demand FROM seasonal_demand WHERE season='Summer' ORDER BY demand DESC
SELECT product_id, month, demand FROM historic_demand WHERE month='January' ORDER BY demand ASC
SELECT product_id, current_level, optimal_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_level > optimal_level
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand WHERE season='Fall' AND demand > 100 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT product_id, season, demand FROM seasonal_demand WHERE season='Winter' AND demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT product_name, season, demand_level FROM seasonal_demand_pattern;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, current_stock_level, optimal_stock_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock_level < optimal_stock_level;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM product_details WHERE supplier_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM product_details JOIN sales_data ON product_details.product_id = sales_data.product_id;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_pattern WHERE season = 'Winter';
SELECT product_name, demand_level FROM seasonal_demand_pattern WHERE demand_level > 100 ORDER BY demand_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level, optimal_stock_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock_level < optimal_stock_level;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM product_details WHERE supplier_id = 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SeasonalDemand;
SELECT product_id, season FROM SeasonalDemand WHERE demand_level > 50;
SELECT product_id, season, demand_level FROM SeasonalDemand ORDER BY demand_level DESC;
SELECT product_id, season FROM SeasonalDemand WHERE season = 'Summer' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductSales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM SeasonalDemand WHERE demand_level > 50 ORDER BY season DESC;
SELECT product_id, season FROM SeasonalDemand WHERE season='Summer';
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM ProductSales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 10000;
SELECT p.product_id, i.inventory_level FROM ProductInventory i JOIN ProductSales s ON i.product_id = s.product_id JOIN SeasonalDemand d ON s.product_id = d.product_id WHERE d.season='Winter';
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, sale_date FROM ProductSales WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
